remarks: Functionality of the determinant, see also definition in [Lang] p. 513. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 9-Jul-2018.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 23-Jul-2019.)
statement:
mdetf.d $e |- D = ( N maDet R ) $.
mdetf.a $e |- A = ( N Mat R ) $.
mdetf.b $e |- B = ( Base ` A ) $.
mdetf.k $e |- K = ( Base ` R ) $.
mdetf $p |- ( R e. CRing -> D : B --> K ) $.
